description:
This module aims to introduce the world of early-stage investments and venture capital to the participants. It will also allow participants to develop a better understanding of the fund-raising process for a startup and appreciate an entrepreneurâ€™s challenges from an early-stage financing point-of-view.

Participants will learn the basic venture-funding skillset from experienced operators and investors. They will also learn about what early stage investors and venture capitalists look out for during the fundraising process, as well as gaining insights about the world of innovation.

This module is designed for aspirational entrepreneurs and working professionals seeking to chase their entrepreneurial dreams.
title: New Venture Finance
prerequisite: Introductory course to New Venture Finance, so no prerequisites, though a cursory understanding of accounting and financial accounting would be helpful
